entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
